metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19709 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: MediaWiki through 1.33.1 allows attackers to bypass the Title_blacklist protection mechanism by starting with an arbitrary title, establishing a non-resolvable redirect for the associated page, and using redirect=1 in the action API when editing that page.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.6-1').
